Plot: When Police Lieutenant Eve Dallas investigates the murder of a top model, she is putting her career on the line, because the prime suspect is her best friend. Eve's investigations lead her into the glamorous world of high fashion.
Characters: Eve Dallas, Roarke, Delia Peabody, Ryan Feeney, Charlotte Mira, Commander Jack Whitney, Mavis Freestone, Nadine Furst, Lawrence Charles Summerset, Leonardo (designer), Trina (beauty consultant), Chief Harrison Tibble, Dickie Berenski, Jake T. Casto
Setting: New York City, New York (United States)
